bibl.title: Four Papyri from the Archive of the Temple of Soknobraisis in Bacchias.
bibl.note: 1. P. CtYBR (= P. Yale) Inv. 343. Loan of Money with Interest in Kind. Mid to late second century. - 2. Inv. 345. Receipt for Dike-Tax. 19 Feb. 174. - 3. Inv. 910. Three Receipts for Various Money Taxes. 8 Jan. 187-188/9. - 4. Inv. 905 qua. Petition by Two Priests to the Prefect. 217-18.
bibl.seg: Amin Benaissa, Four Papyri from the Archive of the Temple of Soknobraisis in Bacchias.

1. P. CtYBR (= P. Yale) Inv. 343. Loan of Money with Interest in Kind. Mid to late second century. - 2. Inv. 345. Receipt for Dike-Tax. 19 Feb. 174. - 3. Inv. 910. Three Receipts for Various Money Taxes. 8 Jan. 187-188/9. - 4. Inv. 905 qua. Petition by Two Priests to the Prefect. 217-18.
